blockquote.p: During the Cold War, there were over 300,000 U.S. troops in Western Europe, now it's about 40,000, and headed for 33,000 in five years.

entry.p: Now that's the kind of military progress I like to see. If only we could see similar progress in Korea, Iraq, Afghanistan, Colombia, and dozens of other countries. Free exchange with all, entangling alliances with none!
